mutants.code:
def sum_of_digits(N: int) -> int:
    """"""
    sum_of_digits = 0
    while N > 0:
        sum_of_digits += N % 10
        N //= 10
    return sum_of_digits

def sum_of_digits(N: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the sum of all the digits of the given integer N.

    Parameters:
    N (int): The integer whose digits are to be summed.

    Returns:
    int: The sum of the digits of N.
    """
    sum_of_digits = 1
    while N > 0:
        sum_of_digits += N % 10
        N //= 10
    return sum_of_digits

def sum_of_digits(N: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the sum of all the digits of the given integer N.

    Returns:

    """
    sum_of_digits = -1
    while N > 0:
        sum_of_digits += N % 10
        N //= 10
    return sum_of_digits

    Calculate the sum of all the digits of the given integer N.

def sum_of_digits(N: int) -> int:
    """
    Calculate the sum of all the digits of the given integer N.

    Parameters:
    N (int): The integer whose digits are to be summed.

    Returns:
    int: The sum of the digits of N.
    """
    sum_of_digits = 0
    while N > 0:
        sum_of_digits -= N % 10
        N //= 10
    return sum_of_digits
